name: Application by trustee
text: §501-135  Application by trustee.  Any trustee may file an application for registration of any land held in trust by the trustee, unless expressly prohibited by the instrument creating the trust. [L 1903, c 56, §69; RL 1925, §3258; RL 1935, §5068; RL 1945, §12668; RL 1955, §342-68; HRS §501-135; gen ch 1985]
